page.title: 02SHOPPING FACILITIES
page.content: The village of{Elham}has three distinct areas:{The High Street, The {Row and The Square. The High Street contains all thr shopping facilities including a Post Office, a garage, bakers, general grocers, iron mongers, estate agents,butchers and public houses. The {Abbots Fireside,}a fine building of c1600, was restored and opened as an hotel in 1938. In The Square, again the houses and the King's Arms which bound it on three sides are all noteworthy. The Church of St. Mary the Virgin borders the southern side. {North Lyminge}is mainly residential with the Post Office, hardware store, bakers, bank, butchers, estate agents, general grocers and surgery in the main street.
